name: Thor%27s_Trading_Post
text:
Thor's Trading Post
Thor's Trading Post, originally known as Wakahannawawak Trading Post, was a trading post located in Twin Peaks, Washington.
History
The Wakahannawawak Trading Post was founded by 1888 and dealt furs and potables. The trading post was also said by some to offer opium.
By 1905, the trading post adopted the name Thor's and faced its fiercest competition with the newly established Horne's General Store. However, the trading post eventually burned down under mysterious circumstances.
